GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets the properties of the specified container group in the specified subscription and resource group. The operation returns the properties of each container group including containers, image registry credentials, restart policy, IP address type, OS type, state, and volumes.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update container groups with specified configurations.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates container group tags with specified values.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Delete the specified container group in the specified subscription and resource group. The operation does not delete other resources provided by the user, such as volumes.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Get a list of container groups in a specified subscription and resource group. This operation returns properties of each container group including containers, image registry credentials, restart policy, IP address type, OS type, state, and volumes.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetContainerGroups
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Get a list of container groups in the specified subscription. This operation returns properties of each container group including containers, image registry credentials, restart policy, IP address type, OS type, state, and volumes.

OtherOperations.Name: Restart
OtherOperations.Description: Restarts all containers in a container group in place. If container image has updates, new image will be downloaded.

OtherOperations.Name: Stop
OtherOperations.Description: Stops all containers in a container group. Compute resources will be deallocated and billing will stop.

OtherOperations.Name: Start
OtherOperations.Description: Starts all containers in a container group. Compute resources will be allocated and billing will start.

OtherOperations.Name: GetOutboundNetworkDependenciesEndpoints
OtherOperations.Description: Gets all the network dependencies for this container group to allow complete control of network setting and configuration. For container groups, this will always be an empty list.

OtherOperations.Name: GetContainerLogs
OtherOperations.Description: Get the logs for a specified container instance in a specified resource group and container group.

OtherOperations.Name: ExecuteContainerCommand
OtherOperations.Description: Executes a command for a specific container instance in a specified resource group and container group.

OtherOperations.Name: AttachContainer
OtherOperations.Description: Attach to the output stream of a specific container instance in a specified resource group and container group.
